instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook pro 15, 820 2915 B, After reballing don't show image
threads.message:
Hey guys, 

Reballijng BGA, and after this don't show image. i hear the common sound and no image.. already change the chip twice. i have 0v pin 1 U9000. i think the problem is here..

threads.title: Macbook pro 15, 820 2915 B, After reballing don't show image
threads.message: Why dont take it to apple for a FREE motherboard replace before touch anything.... This could be a bad solder under GPU, or you move something during extraction,

threads.title: Macbook pro 15, 820 2915 B, After reballing don't show image
threads.message:
Free motherboard? i don't know are you means... this motherboard has arrived in a store off my boss. and my job is to try repair it.

But ok thank you for the help ...............................

threads.title: Macbook pro 15, 820 2915 B, After reballing don't show image
threads.message: Clean it up and take it to Apple.
